content:
Yes, many studios have made similar efforts towards promoting diversity in their films. For example, Disney's recent Marvel films have featured more diverse superheroes, such as Black Panther and Captain Marvel, and Warner Bros' recent release of "In the Heights" highlighted the Latino community. Other studios, such as Sony Pictures and Paramount Pictures, have also made public statements and launched initiatives to promote diversity and inclusion in their films and organizations. 

Overall, it seems that there is a growing recognition in Hollywood of the importance of diversity and representation in film, and an effort to tell more diverse stories. However, there is still a long way to go towards achieving true inclusivity in the entertainment industry.
